mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, SAVE_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_PATH, ORG_FILE_NAME, EXT, OCR_TEXT, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT -- TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT FROM OCR_INFO ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OCR_INFO ( SEQ, SAVE_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_PATH, ORG_FILE_NAME, EXT, OCR_TEXT, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM OCR_INFO), #{saveFileName}, #{saveFilePath}, #{orgFileName}, #{ext}, #{ocrText}, #{regId}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{regDt} )
